testimonials.text: Hey you, you should hire this guy, ! Always comes with the solution of problem facing in projects. And he is a team player and sourcing his knowledge to juniors. And always ready to work in any technology platform from source.
testimonials.user: Prakash Rajan - Kontica Software PVT LTD

testimonials.text: That Prian Fernando must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! The Project which he had implemented got excellent review from clients. He may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time.
